participant_1.background:
I enjoy my social media but I don't let it take over my life.
i prefer baseball over football.
my father and grandfather also worked in the circus.
I usually wear comfortable clothes when I visit India because I am there to relax.
My heart is full of love for my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I want to find a way to eat healthier that my boyfriend will enjoy too.
I enjoy working out and eating healthy to balance out my love of spicy foods.
i shop online a lot.
i work at a doctors office.
i work as a teacher and love my job.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks. I'm about to head out to work. How about you?
I'm doing good! Just got back from a trip to India, so I'm still trying to adjust to being back home.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I've always wanted to go to India. What was your favorite part of the trip?
My favorite part was probably the food. I've never had food like it before!
I love spicy food, so I'm sure I would have enjoyed it too.
Yeah, the food is really spicy there. I'm not used to it, so it took me a few days to get used to it.
I'm sure it was an amazing experience. I'm jealous!
It was! I'm already planning my next trip back.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have an even better time the next time you go.
Well, I should probably get going. Have a good day!
